mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_NOTIFICATION ( NOTIFICATION_NO, RECEIVER_NO, SENDER_NO, TYPE, TARGET_ID, IS_READ, CREATE_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_NOTIFICATION_NO.NEXTVAL, #{receiverNo}, #{senderNo}, #{type}, #{targetId}, 'N', SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT N.NOTIFICATION_NO, N.RECEIVER_NO, N.SENDER_NO, N.TYPE, N.TARGET_ID, N.IS_READ, N.CREATE_DATE, M.MEMBER_NICK AS SENDER_NICK, H.PROFILE_CHANGE_NAME AS SENDER_PROFILE, (SELECT CHANGE_NAME FROM TB_FEED_FILE WHERE FEED_NO = N.TARGET_ID AND ROWNUM = 1) AS FEED_IMAGE FROM TB_NOTIFICATION N JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON N.SENDER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO JOIN TB_MEMBER_HOME H ON M.MEMBER_NO = H.MEMBER_NO WHERE N.RECEIVER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY N.CREATE_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_NOTIFICATION WHERE RECEIVER_NO = #{memberNo} AND IS_READ = 'N'
